name: jain-events-portal
description: A web portal for Jain University Events.

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:clientview" "npm run start:adminview"
scripts.init: npx concurrently "npm run init:backend" "npm run init:clientview" "npm run init:adminview"
scripts.update: npx concurrently "npm run update:backend" "npm run update:clientview" "npm run update:adminview"
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:clientview: cd clientview && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:adminview: cd adminview && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean: npx concurrently "npm run clean:backend" "npm run clean:clientview" "npm run clean:adminview" && npm cache clean --force

author: Jery
